      • spawn

        public void spawn(Paddle activePaddle)
        Create the ball and prepare it for play.
        Parameters:
        activePaddle - if null will spawn the ball at the center of the screen just below the activeBlocks aching down. otherwise will spawn the ball arching upwards from the paddle given

        Parameters:
